data.title: About: Danny Lux
data.meta_description: Daniel Scott “Danny” Lux (born June 5, 1969) is an American composer who has contributed music for television and film productions. Film credits include Halloween: Resurrection and Stolen Summer (both in 2002). TV series credits include theme music for Sliders, Million Dollar Mysteries, Crisis Center (first Emmy nomination), Profiler (second Emmy nomination), and Boston Legal. Additional series to which Lux has contributed music include My Name Is Earl (with Mark Leggett), Boston Legal, Grey's Anatomy, Karen Sisco, Hack, Ally McBeal (one BMI win), Boston Public, NYPD Blue (two BMI wins, both shared with Mike Post), John Doe, Sabrina, the Teenage Witch, The Good Wife, Melrose Place, Dawson's Creek, Suits, Magic's Biggest Secrets Finally Revealed, Mistresses, and Manifest.
data.text:
dbo:abstract

Daniel Scott "Danny" Lux (* červen 1969) je americký hudební skladatel, který spolupracoval na několika filmových projektech v USA. Hudbu vytvořil například pro filmy Halloween: Zmrtvýchvstání nebo , což bylo v roce 2002. Tvořil také pro seriály, jako například Cesta do neznáma, , (zde byl poprvé nominován na cenu Emmy), dále pak , (zde nominován podruhé) nebo . Dodatečně pak Jmenuju se Earl, Chirurgové, , Taxík, Ally McBealová, , , , Sabrina - mladá čarodějnice, , Melrose Place a Dawsonův svět. (cs)

Daniel Scott “Danny” Lux (born June 5, 1969) is an American composer who has contributed music for television and film productions. Film credits include Halloween: Resurrection and Stolen Summer (both in 2002). TV series credits include theme music for Sliders, Million Dollar Mysteries, Crisis Center (first Emmy nomination), Profiler (second Emmy nomination), and Boston Legal. Additional series to which Lux has contributed music include My Name Is Earl (with Mark Leggett), Boston Legal, Grey's Anatomy, Karen Sisco, Hack, Ally McBeal (one BMI win), Boston Public, NYPD Blue (two BMI wins, both shared with Mike Post), John Doe, Sabrina, the Teenage Witch, The Good Wife, Melrose Place, Dawson's Creek, Suits, Magic's Biggest Secrets Finally Revealed, Mistresses, and Manifest. (en)

Daniel Scott „Danny“ Lux (* 5. Juni 1969) ist ein US-amerikanischer Komponist, der vor allem für die Kompositionen von Fernsehfilmen und erfolgreichen Fernsehserien wie Boston Public, Boston Legal, Ally McBeal, My Name Is Earl und Sabrina – Total Verhext! bekannt ist. (de)

Daniel Scott “Danny” Lux, né en juin 1969, est un compositeur de musiques de films et séries télévisées. (fr)

Daniel Scott Lux, conosciuto come Danny Lux (5 giugno 1969), è un compositore statunitense. Ha composto musiche per film e serie televisive, tra cui: Halloween - La resurrezione e Ally McBeal. (it)

Daniel Scott “Danny” Lux (ur. 5 czerwca 1969) – amerykański kompozytor, który tworzy muzykę do filmowych i telewizyjnych produkcji. (pl)
